title: ComputerVisionAPIs

Face Liveness Detection (Phone Selfie)

api_list.name: Ocr_CreditCard
api_list.description:
Supports all cards(credit, debit, travel, prepaid, corporate…) from  Visa, MasterCard, American Express, RuPay, Discover…
Sample Images: https://ibb.co/album/x33rzs

api_list.name: Ocr_ALPR
api_list.description:
License Plate Recognition

api_list.name: Ocr_IDCard
api_list.description:
Suppport All Kinds of Local Identity Cards, Passports, Driver Licenses, Visas, Resident Cards… by recognizing MRZ (Machine Readable Zone).
Sample Images: https://ibb.co/album/x33rzs

api_list.name: Ocr_BankCheck
api_list.description:
Supports E-13B or CMC-7 format documents by recognizing MICR (Magnetic ink character recognition)
Sample Images: https://ibb.co/album/x33rzs

api_list.name: Face_Compare
